name: Hue (itch) (TheHueCreators)
description:
Welcome to our game, Hue! A platformer game where instead of the platforms pre-existing for you, it's your job to draw them! Use your creativity and problem solving skills using paint colors in red, yellow, and blue to get through levels filled with spikes, enemy waves, zero (and reverse) gravity and more!

Credits:

  • Andre Rognaldsen (Art)
  • Kachi Onyeador (Programmer)
  • Lauren Koch (Programmer)
  • Ivy Bragin (Programmer)
